column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Our waitress was nice and explained things pretty well since we were all first-timers. It was cool that they have a whiskey room that looked really interesting for whiskey lovers. We ordered "The King" pancake which consisted of a very blue pancake
column2: banana cream and peanut butter glaze over it. When it came out
column4: but it actually wasn't which was a lot more pleasant. The dish was really tasty and loved the texture of the pancake. It seems like there's some kind of ingredient that makes the pancake blue
column5: but it's just dye... so "blue suede pancake" is just fancy naming.
